job.role: Senior Customer Success Manager / Customer Success Director
job.teaser: You will be responsible for developing existing clients, spotting new business opportunities and maintaining our reputation for outstanding client relationships and first class service delivery.
job.spec: https://static.crmtechnologies.com/sites/default/files/CRMT-Digital_Senior Customer Success Manager_Customer Success Director-Job Spec.pdf

job.teaser: Due to a rapidly expanding global client base, we are looking to add an experienced Digital Marketing Specialist to our established UK based team.
We are a looking to recruit an Customer Success Executive to join an established team so we can handle more client managed service campaigns and projects.
We are looking for experienced Data Analyst to join our experienced and expanding UK team.
We have a variety of graduate opportunities available in marketing, IT and business including internships and work placements.
We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Software Developer with strong skills in both back and front end technology.
